<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// frame.  Locations will be one of two forms; a register or an address formed</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// from a base address plus an offset.  Register indirection can be specified by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
